name: Misplaced (SEGA Mega Drive and Genesis)
description:
My name is Hara...

Every day I start in the same way, I wake up on a small strange island that hovers somewhere in the clouds. And today one of these identical days...

Welcome to our meditative puzzler for SEGA MEGA DRIVE\GENESIS  called Misplaced!

Game programmed with C language powered by amazing SGDK. It's FREE or pay what your want. 

There is 2 ROM files with English and Russian versions.

Cheers!

Game OST: https://soundcloud.com/n1k-o/sets/ost-misplaced
